entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
